front.title: Links of prime ideals and their Rees algebras
front.abstract: The paper extends previous results on direct links of prime ideals in Gorenstein rings to the setting of arbitrary Cohen–Macaulay rings. It proves that links of prime ideals under suitable conditions are equimultiple with reduction number one, and studies structural properties of their Rees algebras. The canonical module of the Rees algebra is described explicitly, self-linked prime ideals are characterized, and multiplicity estimates are established for these classes of ideals.
